Directions: In a large bowl, combine the first six ingredients. In a jar with a tight-fitting lid, combine the salad dressing, vinegar, lemon juice, sugar, lemon peel and pepper; shake well. Pour over vegetables. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Ingredients: 2 medium cucumbers - peeled, seeded, and chopped
2 tablespoons white wine vinegar or cider vinegar
